column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=How long can you paint with your penis at one time before it gets too tiring ?
#Text=At most Sexpo 's and Adult Expos I paint for 13 hours a day in half slots so I paint 20 plus paintings a day .
#Text=When I am painting I have to concentrate hard and go into a meditative state ; I do n't notice much going on around me until I have finished .
#Text=Example of Pricasso applying paint before creating a piece of artwork .
#Text=Image : Pricasso .
#Text=Other than your penis , what other parts of your body do you use in the painting process ?

#Text=I quickly worked out that I could speed it up by using my testicles and butt cheeks to cover large areas in no time at all , but only recently do I paint the edges using my butt-crack , I call it the credit card swipe !
#Text=How did you come up with the name Pricasso ?
#Text=That was the heading they christened me with in the Picture Magazine interview in 2006 .
#Text=I realised it was Gold and took out the website and trademark .
#Text=What 's the most positive reaction you 've had to one of your paintings ?
#Text=It is always satisfying to get applause when a painting is finished ; at most adult shows this happened all the time ; but I do like painting disabled people .

#Text=I have painted several people with severe cerebral palsy and they are over the moon with the result ; this gives me the most pleasure , as I do realise that they are still sexually active people and everyone should realise this .
#Text=Have any of your paintings been featured in a gallery somewhere ?
#Text=I have entered the Bald Archy Exhibition in Australia every year and sold a few .
#Text=Also at an exhibition of politicians in Australia , and last November I went to Miami for the Art undressed exhibition and also painted 15 minute portraits there which was fun .
#Text=Do you consider it a form of freedom of expression to create your artwork in the way you do with your penis ?

#Text=When I first thought of the idea I was really thinking I could get invited to a few parties as the entertainment which I do regularly , but now I am getting a good style about my work and want to take it to the next level and be accepted as an innovator .
#Text=A free society throws up these kinds of people , who exercise their freedom in unusual ways .
#Text=— Cape Town former-Mayor Helen Zille
#Text=In 2008 , prior to a Sexpo event in South Africa , you uploaded a video to the Internet of yourself painting a portrait of then-Mayor of Cape Town Helen Zille .
#Text=Why did you decide to do this ?
